content:
@Michael Donnelly We get lots of great results when searching for CDC measures. But I'm seeing a 'bad request' reply when searching for FEMA measures using http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/Measure/FEMADailyHospitalCOVID19Reporting as the measure. Am I doing something wrong? Is this a known issue? Thanks.

https://connectathon.epic.com/Interconnect-Fhir-Unsecure/api/FHIR/R4/MeasureReport?measure=http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/Measure/FEMADailyHospitalCOVID19Reporting&period=ge2020-04-01&period=lt2020-04-30&_format=json
We haven't implemented that yet - I focused on breadth for the CDC measure instead.
